Miles College Sigmas

This is the Official Website of the Sigma Chapter of Phi Beta Sigma Fraternity, Inc.

Chapter History

The Sigma Chapter of Phi Beta Sigma Inc. was founded on January 23, 1925 by William A. Bell, the 2nd President of Miles College. Making Sigma Chapter the first Single letter Chapter NPHC Fraternity in the state of Alabama.

Sigma Chapter is currently under the advisory of the graduate chapter of Birmingham, AL Tau Sigma Chapter founded in 1926

Current members of the Advisory team for Sigma Charper are: Leon Moody, Abraham Evans, Cornelius Harris, and Seth Lewis

For Information on years of Lines click here
